SciTK

Class WindowManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • SciTK.WindowManager

  • public class WindowManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Implement a window manager for the analysis GUI. this class is used to place new windows in available screen real estate.
    Author:
    Alex Zylstra
